name: SON OF A BEACH X
description:
Try the long-awaited sequel to indie hit* SON OF A BEACH in SON OF A BEACH X, the all-new, high-falutin' high-definition, high-octane crab-killing simulator!

Featuring new animated enemies, explosions, and a new combat mode, killing crabs has never been more visceral!

DEATH IS INEVITABLE

Music Credits:

March of the Crabs - Anvil (1982)

Surrounded - Hayden Folker (2022)

*in my dreams
